com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.report

Interface Flag

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtractionFlag, SpellingFlag, TermCandidateFlag, TermFlag
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtractionFlagImpl, NullFlag

    public interface Flag
extends Serializable
    A flag marks an issue in a checked document. There are also some specialized kinds of flags like SpellingFlag and TermFlag.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription()
      Gets the description which is rule name (without underscores) or a fixed description which is stored as description in the checking report.
      For some spelling rules this may be an empty string but it is never NULL.
      FlagGroupId getGroupId() 
      URI getHelp() 
      PositionalInformation getPositionalInformation() 
      String getRawDescription() 
      List<Suggestion> getSuggestions() 
      FlagType getType() 
      boolean isBatchReplaceable() 

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        FlagType getType()
        Returns:
        the type of the flag

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Gets the description which is
        1. rule name (without underscores)
        2. or a fixed description
        which is stored as description in the checking report.
        For some spelling rules this may be an empty string but it is never NULL.

      • getPositionalInformation

        PositionalInformation getPositionalInformation()
        Returns:
        the position information - means context and matches, which enables you to locate the position of the issue in the document.

      • getHelp

        URI getHelp()
        Returns:
        return an URI that points to the help page for this flag

      • getSuggestions

        List<Suggestion> getSuggestions()
        Returns:
        the suggestions for this flag. This is a list
        1. with no entries, for unknown words or problem types without a suggestion.
        2. with one or multiple suggestion in cases of spelling issues.

      • getRawDescription

        String getRawDescription()
        Returns:
        the raw description as it is in the Acrolinx Server. For rule flags this will return the rule id with underscores.

      • getGroupId

        FlagGroupId getGroupId()
        Returns:
        The FlagGroupId grouping Flags. For batch ignores and replacements.
        See also: isBatchReplaceable()

      • isBatchReplaceable

        boolean isBatchReplaceable()
        Returns:
        true, if the Flag is batch replaceable. To find other flags of same kind you have to check the getGroupId(). If you want to apply replacements you also have to compare the Suggestion.getGroupId().
